sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chan hou zhong feng 產後中風 , wind stroke following delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry biao 鰾 quotes Jing xiao chan bao 經效產寶 : 產後搐搦強直者，不可便作風中， 乃風入子臟，與破傷風同。用鰾膠一兩，以螺粉炒焦，去粉為末。分三 服，煎蟬蛻湯下 , “In the case of convulsions and stiffness following delivery , one must not act as if this were a wind stroke. Now, when wind enters the child depot, this is identical with wound wind. Take 1 liang of biao jiao , and burn together with luo fen . Discard the powder and grind it to powder. Divide into three portions. Ingest with a chan tuo decoction”.
